content.description: Scientists claim that changes in the rate of photosynthesis will be reflected by changes in <math alttext="p H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.
content.question: Which of the following best supports their claim?

choices.label: Algae performing photosynthesis remove <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> from the solution, increasing <math alttext="p H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

Algae performing photosynthesis release <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> into the solution, decreasing <math alttext="p H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

Algae performing photosynthesis remove <math alttext="O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> from the solution, decreasing <math alttext="p H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

Algae performing photosynthesis release <math alttext="O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> into the solution, increasing <math alttext="p H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: Algae performing photosynthesis remove <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> from the solution, increasing <math alttext="p H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from biological principles, concepts, processes, and data.
